20101221010101.000|20101221010101.000|CC1|CORPORATIONS.

20101221010109.000|20101221010111.000|CC1|>> GROUNDED.

20101221010114.000|20101221010116.000|CC1|TRANSPORTATION ACROSS EUROPE.

20101221010234.000|20101221010251.000|CC1|AGE 61.                         
20101221010251.000|20101221010253.000|CC1|HELLO.

20101221010310.000|20101221010313.000|CC1|AND OTHERS.

20101221010318.000|20101221010321.000|CC1|>> THERE WAS NO WINTER

20101221010556.000|20101221010557.000|CC1|KOREA.

20101221010601.000|20101221010602.000|CC1|THREATS FROM NORTH KOREA.

20101221010650.000|20101221010652.000|CC1|TAKE PLACE.                     
20101221010652.000|20101221010655.000|CC1|>> THE ONGOING LIVE FIRE        
20101221010655.000|20101221010703.000|CC1|EXERCISE ON YEONPYEONG ISLAND IS
20101221010703.000|20101221010705.000|CC1|A STANDARD AND LEGITIMATE       
20101221010705.000|20101221010707.000|CC1|DEFENSE EXERCISE.               
20101221010707.000|20101221010710.000|CC1|THE EXERCISE IS A MATTER OF     
20101221010710.000|20101221010710.000|CC1|NATIONAL SOVEREIGNTY.           
20101221010710.000|20101221010713.000|CC1|>> EARLIER, THE NORTH HAD WARNED

20101221010723.000|20101221010727.000|CC1|REPORTED NEAR THE BORDER.       
20101221010727.000|20101221010733.000|CC1|THROUGH THE STATE MEDIA, THEY   
20101221010733.000|20101221010735.000|CC1|SAY IT WAS A PROVOCATION.       
20101221010735.000|20101221010737.000|CC1|ALTHOUGH THEY SAID IT WAS NOT   
20101221010737.000|20101221010740.000|CC1|WORTH REACTING TO.              
20101221010740.000|20101221010742.000|CC1|IT IS NOT TAKING ANY CHANCES.   
20101221010742.000|20101221010744.000|CC1|BBC NEWS, SEOUL, KOREA.         
20101221010744.000|20101221010749.000|CC1|>> IRANIAN STATE TV IS REPORTING
20101221010749.000|20101221010750.000|CC1|AN UNPRECEDENTED NUMBER OF      
20101221010750.000|20101221010751.000|CC1|PEOPLE -- AN UNSPECIFIED NUMBER 
20101221010751.000|20101221010800.000|CC1|OF PEOPLE KILLED.               
20101221010800.000|20101221010800.000|CC1|6.5 WAS THE LEVEL.              
20101221010800.000|20101221010803.000|CC1|THEY WERE DEVASTATED BY AN      
20101221010803.000|20101221010806.000|CC1|EARTHQUAKE IN 2003, WHERE 26,000
20101221010806.000|20101221010808.000|CC1|DIED.                           
20101221010808.000|20101221010809.000|CC1|COUNTERTERRORISM POLICE MADE A  
20101221010809.000|20101221010812.000|CC1|SERIES OF ARRESTS TODAY.        
20101221010812.000|20101221010814.000|CC1|IT WAS THE MOST HIGH-PROFILE    
20101221010814.000|20101221010815.000|CC1|SINCE APRIL OF LAST YEAR.       
20101221010815.000|20101221010817.000|CC1|THOSE DETAINED WERE MOSTLY      
20101221010817.000|20101221010820.000|CC1|BRITISH NATIONALS AGED BETWEEN  
20101221010820.000|20101221010821.000|CC1|17 AND 28.                      
20101221010821.000|20101221010823.000|CC1|SPANISH POLICE HAVE RECOVERED   
20101221010823.000|20101221010828.000|CC1|ALL BUT ONE OF THE THINGS STOLEN
20101221010828.000|20101221010829.000|CC1|FROM A WAREHOUSE IN MADRID.     
20101221010829.000|20101221010834.000|CC1|THERE WAS A SKETCH BY PICASSO.  
20101221010834.000|20101221010836.000|CC1|TWO VALUE TOGETHER WERE VALUED  
20101221010836.000|20101221010847.000|CC1|AT MORE THAN $6 MILLION.        
20101221010847.000|20101221010848.000|CC1|THE EUROPEAN SECURITY           
20101221010848.000|20101221010850.000|CC1|ORGANIZATION HAS DECLARED       
20101221010850.000|20101221010851.000|CC1|SUNDAY'S PRESIDENTIAL ELECTION  
20101221010851.000|20101221010853.000|CC1|IN GANDARILLAS WAS SERIOUSLY    
20101221010853.000|20101221010854.000|CC1|FLAWED.                         
20101221010854.000|20101221010857.000|CC1|OBSERVERS CRITICIZE THE VOTE AND
20101221010857.000|20101221010859.000|CC1|A VIOLENT BACKLASH AGAINST      
20101221010859.000|20101221010900.000|CC1|OPPOSITION CANDIDATES.          
20101221010900.000|20101221010901.000|CC1|SEVEN OF NINE HAVE BEEN ARRESTED
20101221010901.000|20101221010906.000|CC1|OR ABDUCTED PRE-EMPT PRESENT -- 
20101221010906.000|20101221010910.000|CC1|WERE ARRESTED OR ABDUCTED.      
20101221010910.000|20101221010915.000|CC1|PRESIDENT LUKASHENKO WAS BACK IN
20101221010915.000|20101221010916.000|CC1|OFFICE.                         
20101221010916.000|20101221010918.000|CC1|>> IS SEEN LOSING HIS TOUCH?    
20101221010918.000|20101221010920.000|CC1|WHEN THE RESULTS CAME IN THIS   
20101221010920.000|20101221010924.000|CC1|TIME, HE ONLY GOT 75% -- IS HE

20101221010928.000|20101221010933.000|CC1|MR. LUKASHENKO POLLS FAR LOWER  
20101221010933.000|20101221010934.000|CC1|THAN THAT.

20101221010936.000|20101221010936.000|CC1|ELECTION.                       
20101221010936.000|20101221010940.000|CC1|IN THE CENTER OF MINCED, IT WAS 
20101221010940.000|20101221010941.000|CC1|THE LARGEST PROTEST THEY HAVE   
20101221010941.000|20101221010942.000|CC1|SEEN IN YEARS -- IN THE CENTER  
20101221010942.000|20101221010945.000|CC1|OF MINSK.                       
20101221010945.000|20101221010948.000|CC1|THEY MOVED IN TO BREAK UP THE   
20101221010948.000|20101221010950.000|CC1|CROWD.

20101221011013.000|20101221011017.000|CC1|TO THE HOSPITAL.                
20101221011017.000|20101221011018.000|CC1|THERE WERE PLAINCLOTHES

20101221011035.000|20101221011038.000|CC1|POLL ASKED LOT.

20101221011046.000|20101221011049.000|CC1|>> THE PEOPLE OF BELARUS CAN DO 
20101221011049.000|20101221011056.000|CC1|BETTER.                         
20101221011056.000|20101221011104.000|CC1|>> PRESIDENT LUKASHENKO HAS     
20101221011104.000|20101221011106.000|CC1|BEEN ACCUSED IN THE PAST OF     
20101221011106.000|20101221011110.000|CC1|FALSIFYING THE VOTE AND HAS

20101221012201.000|20101221012203.000|CC1|THEY CALLED, AND THEY MADE HER  
20101221012203.000|20101221012205.000|CC1|LISTEN AS THEY TORTURED HIM.    
20101221012205.000|20101221012208.000|CC1|SHE PAID THE RANSOM, BUT THEY   
20101221012208.000|20101221012209.000|CC1|KILLED HIM ANYWAY.              
20101221012209.000|20101221012213.000|CC1|>> I AM AFRAID TO STEP OUTSIDE  
20101221012213.000|20101221012214.000|CC1|MY FLAT, BECAUSE THEY MIGHT     
20101221012214.000|20101221012216.000|CC1|SHOOT ME.                       
20101221012216.000|20101221012224.000|CC1|I AM EXHAUSTED.                 
20101221012224.000|20101221012227.000|CC1|>> SHOOTINGS, KIDNAPPINGS,      
20101221012227.000|20101221012229.000|CC1|BOMBINGS, THESE ARE THE KINDS OF
20101221012229.000|20101221012231.000|CC1|CRIMES THAT THE IRAQI POLICE    
20101221012231.000|20101221012233.000|CC1|HAVE TO FACE AS THEY GO ABOUT   
20101221012233.000|20101221012237.000|CC1|THEIR DAILY DUTIES.             
20101221012237.000|20101221012239.000|CC1|TODAY'S SCUTTLES ARE PART OF A  
20101221012239.000|20101221012241.000|CC1|TRAINING EXERCISE, RUN BY       
20101221012241.000|20101221012242.000|CC1|AMERICAN SOLDIERS.              
20101221012242.000|20101221012244.000|CC1|THOSE ARE THE ONES IN THE LIGHT 
20101221012244.000|20101221012245.000|CC1|GREEN UNIFORMS.                 
20101221012245.000|20101221012247.000|CC1|THEY ARE FINDING THEMSELVES ON  
20101221012247.000|20101221012248.000|CC1|THE RECEIVING END OF SOME ROUGH 
20101221012248.000|20101221012249.000|CC1|TREATMENT.                      
20101221012249.000|20101221012252.000|CC1|THERE ARE THE ROCKY SECURITY    
20101221012252.000|20101221012252.000|CC1|FORCES.                         
20101221012252.000|20101221012255.000|CC1|BUT MANY PRIVATELY ADMIT THIS   
20101221012255.000|20101221012258.000|CC1|WILL BE A CHALLENGE -- THEY ARE 
20101221012258.000|20101221012304.000|CC1|THE IRAQI SECURITY FORCES.      
20101221012304.000|20101221012307.000|CC1|IN BAGHDAD, SOME PLACES OF      
20101221012307.000|20101221012310.000|CC1|RETURNING TO NORMALITY.         
20101221012310.000|20101221012313.000|CC1|BUT THERE ARE HUNDREDS OF POLICE
20101221012313.000|20101221012314.000|CC1|AND MILITARY CHECKPOINTS ACROSS 
20101221012314.000|20101221012315.000|CC1|THE CITY.

20101221012317.000|20101221012319.000|CC1|SURROUNDED BY CONCRETE BLAST

20101221012321.000|20101221012324.000|CC1|STREET, SOMEWHERE IN THE BACK OF

20101221012330.000|20101221012333.000|CC1|LIKELY FOR YEARS TO COME.       
20101221012333.000|20101221012335.000|CC1|GABRIEL GATEHOUSE, BBC NEWS, IN 
20101221012335.000|20101221012335.000|CC1|BAGHDAD.                        
20101221012335.000|20101221012342.000|CC1|>> NO APOLOGIES NOW FOR TAKING A
20101221012342.000|20101221012344.000|CC1|LITTLE TIME FOR ONE OF OUR OWN. 
20101221012344.000|20101221012347.000|CC1|HE WAS 61, A PRE-EMINENT        
20101221012347.000|20101221012351.000|CC1|BROADCAST JOURNALIST, AND HE WAS
20101221012351.000|20101221012355.000|CC1|A HOUSEHOLD NAME IN BRITAIN.    
20101221012355.000|20101221012358.000|CC1|HE WAS ON A PEDESTAL FOR MANY OF
20101221012358.000|20101221012359.000|CC1|US AND FOR MANY VIEWERS.        
20101221012359.000|20101221012402.000|CC1|WE PAY TRIBUTE.                 
20101221012402.000|20101221012406.000|CC1|>> BRIAN HANRAHAN WAS A GREAT   
20101221012406.000|20101221012407.000|CC1|JOURNALIST, A BRITISH           
20101221012407.000|20101221012411.000|CC1|BROADCASTER -- A GREAT          
20101221012411.000|20101221012411.000|CC1|BROADCASTER.                    
20101221012411.000|20101221012413.000|CC1|IN HIS ASSIGNMENTS AROUND THE   
20101221012413.000|20101221012416.000|CC1|WORLD, HE HAD THE TRUST OF BBC  
20101221012416.000|20101221012416.000|CC1|VIEWERS AND THE RESPECT AND     
20101221012416.000|20101221012418.000|CC1|ADMIRATION OF HIS COLLEAGUES.   
20101221012418.000|20101221012422.000|CC1|HIS BIG BREAK WAS THE BALKANS   
20101221012422.000|20101221012423.000|CC1|WAR IN 1982.                    
20101221012423.000|20101221012425.000|CC1|THE NAVY DID NOT WANT HIM TO    
20101221012425.000|20101221012427.000|CC1|GIVE AWAY MILITARY SECRETS WHEN 
20101221012427.000|20101221012428.000|CC1|ITS CARRIER JETS RAIDED THE     
20101221012428.000|20101221012430.000|CC1|AIRFIELD AT FORT STANLEY.       
20101221012430.000|20101221012433.000|CC1|BUT HANRAHAN HAD A GREAT STEP --
20101221012433.000|20101221012439.000|CC1|SKILL AS A REPORTER, FINDING THE
20101221012439.000|20101221012441.000|CC1|RIGHT WORDS, BUT NOT TOO MANY OF
20101221012441.000|20101221012443.000|CC1|THEM, AT THE RIGHT TIME.        
20101221012443.000|20101221012447.000|CC1|>> I COUNTED THEM ALL OUT, AND I
20101221012447.000|20101221012448.000|CC1|COUNTED THEM ALL BACK.

20101221012450.000|20101221012453.000|CC1|THUMBS-UP SIGNS.

20101221012506.000|20101221012507.000|CC1|SOME TIME.

20101221012535.000|20101221012537.000|CC1|SHAPE OUR TIMES, LIKE THE NIGHT
